name: Space Cracks!
description:
(game made in three days for the Ludum Dare #49 game jam)

You were sent to a planet that became so unstable that cracks keep forming into the ground! Will you manage to save it and restore it to the beautiful green planet that it once was?

Credits:

  • Art and animations by Filip Grudziel
  • Programming by Guillaume Brunerie
  • Music and sounds come from a Humble Bundle of music and sound effects
